name: different constantpool order 1
description:
Two versions of `org.apache.commons.configuration2.plist.XMLPropertyListConfiguration` in `commons-configuration2-2.7.jar` built with *openjdk-8.0.372* and *openjdk-9.0.1* respectivly. 
Both versions differ in the constant pool orders used by the binaries. The version built with openjdk 8 also has a redundant `checkcast` instruction due to a compiler bug.
